Articles.Content:
I was thinking about how would a "serious" kerbal flag looks like. Like.. we had USA flag on moon or whatever... I can imagine that Kerbin as a planet can be a one huge state, confederation or something like that, so there wouldnt be 200+ different states, only regions with regional goverment, just basicaly system you have in US or in west EU, which can work obviously well.

What would such flag looks like then? Stars and stripes representating regions/states , green or different?

What do you think?

PS: Because one does not simply use KSP default flag, since its dull to put such a flag anywhere. Imagine that first flag on moon would be flag of NASA with "US space program" title.
Well, Kerbin as of right now doesn't really have any states or regions. That's a hard question to respond to. So, I don't know.
